column4: Hello, I wonder if anyone can help me, I'm a new convert from Windows and I need help with my Graphics Tablet
Hello, I wonder if anyone can help me, I'm a new convert from Windows and I need help with my Graphics Tablet

that's probably something someone can't help you with here on IRC that fast, you would probably get more support on the forums www.ubuntuforums.org then you can put your question there and people with knowledge about graphics tablets will answer
